commands.task add: Add a task on current project.
commands.task rm: Add a task on current project.
commands.task ls: List existing tasks on current project.
commands.subtask add: Add a task as a child of one or more tasks.

errors.COMMAND_WITHOUT_DESCRIPTION: The following command has no description:

warnings.NO_PROJECT_OPENED: You don't have opened any project. See 'open'.

success.PROJECT_CREATED: Project created successfully. See 'task add' to start working.
